item_condition.description: If specified, the specified actions and modifier(s) will only apply to food items that fulfills this condition.
item_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified actions and modifier(s) will only apply to food items that fulfills this condition.

item_action.description: If specified, this item action type will be executed on the remaining item stacks that was consumed.
item_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this item action type will be executed on the remaining item stacks that was consumed.

replace_stack.description: If specified, this item stack will replace the item stack that was consumed *after* consuming it.
replace_stack.markdownDescription: If specified, this item stack will replace the item stack that was consumed *after* consuming it.

food_modifier.description: If specified, this modifier will apply to the food amount gained by eating a food item.
food_modifier.markdownDescription: If specified, this modifier will apply to the food amount gained by eating a food item.

food_modifiers.description: If specified, these modifiers will apply to the food amount gained by eating a food item.
food_modifiers.markdownDescription: If specified, these modifiers will apply to the food amount gained by eating a food item.

saturation_modifier.description: If specified, this modifier will apply to the saturation amount gained by eating a food item.
saturation_modifier.markdownDescription: If specified, this modifier will apply to the saturation amount gained by eating a food item.

saturation_modifiers.description: If specified, these modifiers will apply to the saturation amount gained by eating a food item.
saturation_modifiers.markdownDescription: If specified, these modifiers will apply to the saturation amount gained by eating a food item.

entity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the player that has ate a food item.
entity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the player that has ate a food item.

always_edible.description: Determines whether a food item can be eaten regardless of the player's hunger bar being full.
always_edible.markdownDescription: Determines whether a food item can be eaten regardless of the player's hunger bar being full.

prevent_effects.description: If set to `true`, prevent status effects from being applied.
prevent_effects.markdownDescription: If set to `true`, prevent status effects from being applied.

type.description:
[Power Type](../power_types.md)

Executes an [Entity Action Type](../entity_action_types.md) and modifies the food and saturation level gain of a food item when a player that has the power eats food item.

Type ID: `origins:modify_food`

!!! note

    The actual food saturation level of the food item is determined by the `food * saturation * 2` formula. If you are going to refer to the [Minecraft Wiki: Food (Nourishment value)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_food)' page for the saturation value of the food item, you would have to divide the value by 2.
type.markdownDescription:
[Power Type](../power_types.md)

Executes an [Entity Action Type](../entity_action_types.md) and modifies the food and saturation level gain of a food item when a player that has the power eats food item.

Type ID: `origins:modify_food`

!!! note

    The actual food saturation level of the food item is determined by the `food * saturation * 2` formula. If you are going to refer to the [Minecraft Wiki: Food (Nourishment value)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_food)' page for the saturation value of the food item, you would have to divide the value by 2.
